name: PLANET◯
description:
Take the role of nurturing a small, developing planet trying to grow in a dangerous galaxy. Your planet can't do much on its own, but its inhabitants will defend the place from asteroid and other dangers.

How many years will you be able to keep it alive?

---

HOW TO PLAY

Rotate (drag) the planet with your mouse to aim at the incoming dangers.

Click the buttons over the cities to upgrade them.

---

A game made in 28 hours and 35 minutes for the 46th edition of Ludum Dare (Compo), theme "Keep it alive".

Code, art and sound by @Galbix
